title: Kaivalyam Retreat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Salad bar, Juice bar
description: This restaurant is part of the Kaivalyam Retreat at Munnar which is located on a spice plantation overlooking tea garden hills. Along with accommodations, yoga and nature recreation activities, it caters to promote vegetarian, organic and vegan food choices in a friendly way. Restaurant has a clean environment with vegan options. Free Wi-fi.
